mapper.select:
select
from
and tenantid like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{tenantid}), '%') and referrer_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{referrerId}), '%') and referrer_cert_no like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{referrerCertNo}), '%') and referrer_cert_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{referrerCertType}), '%') and referrer_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{referrerName}), '%') and referrer_email like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{referrerEmail}), '%') and mobile_no like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mobileNo}), '%') and referrer_card_no like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{referrerCardNo}), '%') and status like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{status}), '%') and channel_no like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{channelNo}), '%') and createtime like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{createtime}), '%') and lastmodifiedtime like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{lastmodifiedtime}), '%') and remark like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{remark}), '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into
( tenantid, referrer_id, referrer_cert_no, referrer_cert_type, referrer_name, referrer_email, mobile_no, referrer_card_no, channel_no, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, remark) values
( #{entity.tenantid}, #{entity.referrerId}, #{entity.referrerCertNo}, #{entity.referrerCertType}, #{entity.referrerName}, #{entity.referrerEmail}, #{entity.mobileNo}, #{entity.referrerCardNo}, #{entity.channelNo}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.lastmodifiedtime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into
( tenantid, referrer_id, referrer_cert_no, referrer_cert_type, referrer_name, referrer_email, mobile_no, referrer_card_no, status, channel_no, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, remark) values
(#{entity.tenantid},#{entity.referrerId},#{entity.referrerCertNo},#{entity.referrerCertType},#{entity.referrerName},#{entity.referrerEmail},#{entity.mobileNo},#{entity.referrerCardNo},#{entity.status},#{entity.channelNo},#{entity.createtime},#{entity.lastmodifiedtime},#{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update tenantid=values(tenantid), referrer_id=values(referrer_id), referrer_cert_no=values(referrer_cert_no), referrer_cert_type=values(referrer_cert_type), referrer_name=values(referrer_name), referrer_email=values(referrer_email), mobile_no=values(mobile_no), referrer_card_no=values(referrer_card_no), status=values(status), channel_no=values(channel_no), createtime=values(createtime), lastmodifiedtime=values(lastmodifiedtime), remark=values(remark)
